dublin_core.dcvalue: Scipio, D. A. (2018). Understanding, Redefining, and Designing for Broadening Participation. In Kay, J. and Luckin, R. (Eds.) Rethinking Learning in the Digital Age: Making the Learning Sciences Count, 13th International Conference of the Learning Sciences (ICLS) 2018, Volume 3. London, UK: International Society of the Learning Sciences.
International Society of the Learning Sciences, Inc. [ISLS].
Understanding, Redefining, and Designing for Broadening Participation
